message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm!  However, $150 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm happy to pay $110 for it.  Let's see if we can work something out.
I understand that $150 is a bit steep, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $135.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $135 is still a bit high for me.  How about we split the difference and go with $125? I'm really interested in this product, and I think this price would be fair for both of us.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. I can offer it to you for $130.
Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $130 is still a little more than I'm comfortable paying.  I'm happy to pay $127.  Let's see if we can make this work!
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we might not be able to meet in the middle, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $129.
